name: Let's clean up with Midori and Shin! — A YOUR TURN TO DIE FAN GAME.
name_original: Let's clean up with Midori and Shin! — A YOUR TURN TO DIE FAN GAME.
description:
Shin Tsukimi is going through a hard time and anyone can see that in his room!! Good thing, Hiyori-kun is there to help him... Right?

Win some minigames and help Shin clean his messy room!

//

THIS IS A YOUR TURN TO DIE FANMADE GAME. It includes 7 CGS, 2 minigames and 1 quick time event. Pretty short, but I hope you can find it enjoyable!

WARNING: Not-so-healthy relationships. (You know how Midori is...) Loud noises (rarely!). Pre-Game.

THIS GAME CONTAINS: SouShin. (It's implied).
